# Exercise 2.3.25
```{r}
A = matrix(c(12, 2, 21, 3, 10, 2), nrow = 3, ncol = 2)
B = matrix(c(21, 18, 20, 14, 10, 13), nrow = 2, ncol = 3)
A %*% B # (3, 2) means the total cost of product hoods by Plan2
which.min(colSums(A %*% B)) # Plan3 is the most economical
```
